marklogic.body: Sigh, a couple of years ago 6 black men raped and tortured a young teenage couple for days cutting Off the breasts of the girl with a knife, raping her many times. The boy, if I remember, was forced to watch and then mutilated. The victims were a young teenage white couple on a date. My point? Where was the outrage on this one. I didn't hear Sharpton and Company complaining then despite the utterly horrific manner of the crime. I can cite countless similar crimes. Crime is crime, why must these idiots bring race into everything? I am so sick of the race card I could Vomit. In fact, one could argue it is so old it is actually garnering racism in and unto itself. Get a life and move on. Grow up. Your skin color is not your problem, it is your attitude and expectations. Obama is a symptom of a disease, not the cause. That this man is our president show just how low the culture has sunken. I am so disappointed that the first black president was a man like this. Instead of a Clarence Thomas or Thomas Sowell, Alan West, we get this man. The antithesis of a leader...
